sqlMap.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS REQ_CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NULL AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '01' ) AS REQ_CNT FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = #regUsrId#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId#
SELECT A.PRJ_TYPE FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId# AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
